title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in Model-file DSL and REST API.
highlights: pull & run Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma…

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async wrapper for the Ollama HTTP API; installable from PyPI.
highlights: chat, embed, pull, list, ps helpers

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; mirrors the Python SDK surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLM, embedder and retriever components.

title: ollama-webui (Open WebUI)
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface that connects to local Ollama instances; supports RAG, multi-user, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library wrapping Ollama endpoints with fluent builders and reactive support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem exposing chat, embed and model management methods.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Terminal-UI wrapper written in Go that adds fuzzy search, conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns Ollama into a inline code-copilot with customizable prompts.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Experimental fork adding OpenAI-style function-calling and tool-use to Ollama’s backend.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with local models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and GPU runtime flags.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies OpenAI routes to Ollama, enabling drop-in replacement for front-end apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat & embed widgets plus admin panel management.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that threads replies using local Ollama models and optional RAG via Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to servers with role-based model access and per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-models-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Model-files (GGUF conversions) for niche domains like medicine, law, RPG.
